Skeletal Spirits will also appear all over the isle, attempting to hinder your progress. The first Tortoise can be found by the cliffs north of the tower. The second one can be found in the south, below the cliffs. The last one can be found high up on one of the trees east of the tower. Once all three have been defeated, the tower's seal is broken.

nearItems.name: 软鞭
nearItems.description: Whip. Found on a corpse inside the building known as the Rampart Gaol. This building is first accessed by walking atop the western wall of the castle. Look to the left for a building with a blue roof. Jump onto this roof and then jump down to the cliffs below. Follow the cliffs southeast until you return to a section of the castle with a big square opening. Descend into the opening by landing on the wooden beams. There is a corpse with a Smithing Stone [2] on one of the beams and there are several Rats and a Harpy at the ground level. The corpse with the whip is sitting against a wall.

nearItems.name: 城堡后方

nearItems.name: 软鞭
nearItems.description: Whip. Found on a corpse inside the building known as the Rampart Gaol. This building is first accessed by walking atop the western wall of the castle. Look to the left for a building with a blue roof. Jump onto this roof and then jump down to the cliffs below. Follow the cliffs southeast until you return to a section of the castle with a big square opening. Descend into the opening by landing on the wooden beams. There is a corpse with a Smithing Stone [2] on one of the beams and there are several Rats and a Harpy at the ground level. The corpse with the whip is sitting against a wall.
